headline: The Bull Case For TJX Companies (TJX) Could Change Following Raised Guidance And Market-Share Gains
summary: In recent weeks, TJX Companies reported stronger-than-expected quarterly results, with broad-based comparable sales and earnings growth that led management to raise full-year guidance across its off-price retail banners. Analysts and investors are also focusing on TJX’s continued market share gains and international expansion, which appear increasingly supported by consumer demand for discounted apparel and home goods during a period of economic uncertainty. Now we’ll explore how TJX’s...
